overview: BLOW HARD is a truly exceptional glimpse inside the emerging sensual volcano that was about to explode across America in the Early 70s Swing Parties, orgies, young couples getting it on for the first time, bored spouses seeking easy action on the side, the promiscuity of girl on girl interactions this free spirited gem of a classic shows it allBLOW HARD is that rare time capsule of dirty hard sex that all porn aficionados should own! BLOW HARD was made at a time when it was illegal to shot pornography many of the performers in this film remain anonymous
title: The Blowhard
